text: 5 Fingers, also known as Five Fingers, is a 1952 American spy drama movie directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz and starring James Mason, Elyesa Bazna, Danielle Darrieux, Michael Rennie, Walter Hampden, Herbert Berghof. The screenplay by Michael Wilson was based on the 1950 book Operation Cicero () by Ludwig Carl Moyzisch. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:1952 drama movies Category:American spy movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz
title: 5 Fingers
